# Electric Vengeance, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Electricity Spells|electricity]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 5 ft.

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 111

This spell functions like *[[Electric Vengeance (Spell)|electric vengeance]]**,* except as noted here.

This spell deals 5d8 points of damage +1 per caster level (maximum +15), and the target of the spell must succeed on a Fortitude save or be [[Dazed|dazed]] until the end of your next turn.
